title: Ride Report- Long Beach
content: 69 miles, 3:58 moving time, 2,119 ft elevation Club Ride from Sierra Madre to Long Beach. Sunny morning. We picked up a few more at the Arcadia Golf Course at the top of the Rio Hondo River Trail. It warmed up quick. Slight head winds southbound. Some tail winds on the way back. Even with a flat at mile 15, Tiff’s new TT bike is awesome. As the Rio Hondo Trail merges with the Los Angeles River Trail, Michel connected with the club ride, starting from Glendale. Congrats to Cali and Scott who made it to Long Beach for their first time! We checked in with the PTC Crew who are at American TTT, racing this weekend. And the other crew at Kona 70.3. Congrats to everybody today. Great day for a ride. Tiffany, Cali, Scott, Jeff, MikeO, Joe, Dino, Jonathan, David, MikeW. Michel. Anton. Rob.
